content: --उद्धातः {1} the second of the five kinds of प्रस्तावना, where the first character enters the stage after over-hearing and repeating either the words of the manager ( सूत्रधार) or their sense; see <ls>S. D. 290</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in <ls>Ratn.</ls>, <ls>Ve.</ls> or Mudrārākṣasa. {2} commencement of a tale or narration; आकुमारकथोद्धातं शालिगोप्यो जगुर्यशः <ls>R. 4. 20.</ls>
